articles.description: While England's performance against Iceland was described as "dismal", there is still a belief they can "absolutely" win Euro 2024.
articles.title: 'Boring' & 'dismal' - but are England still 'ready' for Euro 2024?

articles.description: Iga Swiatek takes on Jasmine Paolini in the final of the French Open as she bids for a fifth Grand Slam title.
articles.title: French Open 2024 final: Iga Swiatek faces Jasmine Paolini in Roland Garros showpiece

articles.description: Ireland secure a first European Athletics Championships gold medal since 1998 as their 4x400m mixed relay team superbly triumphs in Rome.
articles.title: Rome 2024: Ireland win first European gold since 1998 with 4x400m mixed relay triumph

articles.description: McLaren’s Lando Norris leads Ferrari’s Carlos Sainz in a delayed and rain-affected first practice session at the Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris fastest in rain-affected Montreal practice

articles.description: Defeat by Australia at the T20 World Cup would not be terminal for England but a win would let them change the narrative after Indian struggles.
articles.title: T20 World Cup 2024: England beating Australia would allow them to change the narrative

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz moves a step closer to a maiden French Open title by beating incoming world number one Jannik Sinner in an engrossing semi-final.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Carlos Alcaraz beats Jannik Sinner to reach Roland Garros final

articles.description: Follow live text and radio coverage from England's Euro 2024 warm-up friendly v Iceland at Wembley.
articles.title: Euro 2024 warm-up LIVE: England v Iceland - radio & text

articles.description: The huge win could help cricket carve out a piece of the largest sport market in the world, America.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Can the USA cricket team win over Americans?

articles.description: The rescheduled bout between Jake Paul and Mike Tyson will take place on 15 November, with Katie Taylor fighting Amanda Serrano.
articles.title: Mike Tyson v Jake Paul bout rescheduled for 15 November in Texas
